class DextopJsResourcePackage

Namespace:Codaxy.Dextop
Base:Object
A class used to manages module's JS files.

Fields

This class has no fields.

Properties

NameDefined in
 public Boolean Concate { get; set; }
Gets or sets a value indicating whether JS content should be concatenated to one file.

 public Boolean Obfuscate { get; set; }
Gets or sets a value indicating whether JS content should be obfuscated.
DextopJsResourcePackage
 public Boolean SmartOverwrite { get; set; }
When enabled result js files will not be overriden until source files are modified.

DextopJsResourcePackage
 public void RegisterLocalizations(String[] languages, String pathPrefix, String[] virtualPathFormats)
Registers the localizations files for multiple languages using path formats. '{0}' in the path format will be replaced with the language code.

    The languages.
